vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.29.6;
daughter of: Laban (H3837A);
sister of: Leah (H3812); married to Israel (H3478);
mother of: Joseph (H3130) and Benjamin (H1144)
Also named: Rhachēl<\i> (Ῥαχήλ "Rachel" G4478)
§ Rachel = "ewe"
daughter of Laban, wife of Jacob, and mother of Joseph and Benjamin
vocabInfos._es_Definition: (2)   hija de Labán; esposa de Jacob
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
拉結 这个陰性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "雌羊"
拉班的女兒, 雅各的妻子, 約瑟和便雅憫的母親
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
拉结 这个阴性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "雌羊"
拉班的女儿, 雅各的妻子, 约瑟和便雅悯的母亲
